title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3840/86 of 16 December 1986 amending the nomenclature of goods for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States (NIMEXE)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3840/86 of 16 December 1986 amending the  nomenclature of goods for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade  between Member States (NIMEXE)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex headed 'NIMEXE` to Regulation (EEC) No  1445/72 is hereby  replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in  all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1986.
For the Commission Alois PFEIFFER Member of the Commission
